author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Trump health official on coronavirus: 'We may be seeing the worst upon us right now'
description: A top Trump administration health official, Admiral Brett P. Giroir, said Monday that several parts of the country including are expected to hit their peak this week.
content: A top Trump administration health official, Adm. Brett P. Giroir, said Monday that several parts of the country including New York, New Jersey and Detroit are expected to hit their peaks this week in terms of the number of coronavirus hospitalizations and dea… [+6727 chars]
